entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Incorrect marshalling of Bool return types in new exception handling #113574
  • Implement IRootFunctions for Complex #113569
  • IAsyncEnumerable LINQ and Async context #113567
  • Incorrect comment and maybe missed-optimization in src/coreclr/jit/codegenlinear.cpp for LoongArch & RISC-V #113565
  • IServiceScope.Dispose() and DisposeAsync() should not stop disposing other services if one throws an exception #113563
  • [API Proposal]: ClaimsIdentity to perform case-sensitive comparison #113562
    10.0.0

Closed

  • Bug with ToString() method inheritance in base record class #113570
  • Program incorrectly handles crypto key when running under Linux .NET 9 but is fine under .NET 8 #113555
    Future
  • FreeBSD RIDs started to have the OS major version in it #111900
  • Add support for custom versions of libfuzzer-dotnet in fuzzing #113303
  • IAsyncEnumerable LINQ async context #113566
  • Make System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.LocalizableString effectively public #41505
  • Not Able to Trust the Certificate in the Azure Linux Container App #112485

PullRequests

Created

  • [CI run only] Use funclets and new EH on win-x86 #113576
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Loop cloning for Span #113575
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid infinite loop in recursive type hierarchies #113572
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, 10.0.0
  • LoongArch is a NEW ISA which is different from MIPS #113564
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • JIT: Changes from #113440 with diffs #113559
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Don't call fgMorphBlockStmt in LoopClonning #113558
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] test that Task.Yield yields to browser event loop #113531
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 10.0.0

Updated

  • Fix compare immediate and branch helper for 2^n #113523
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Handle KilledRegisters more efficiently in LinearScan::processKills() #111004
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: enable inlining methods with EH #112998
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Change default boot config to dotnet.boot.js #113374
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Properly handle param reg targets with multiple register assignments #113499
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update llvm-libunwind to 20.1.0 #113513
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Add morphing to LE_UN/GT_UN(expr, uint.MaxValue) (dotnet#76525) #113037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser][st] event pipe #110818
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [browser] managed Diagnostics.Metrics and Diagnostics.Tracing single-threaded #113524
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix double dispose of GCHandle in BrowserWebSocket #113541
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net, os-browser, 9.0.x
  • [browser] [wasm] Make response streaming opt-out #111680
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, os-browser
  • Delete `GT_CNS_LNG` #85951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • performance pipelines triggers unified #113556
    perf-pipeline, needs-area-label
  • Use reflection metadata to represent methods/fields in native layout #113413
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Change ZipBlocks structs to classes #113453
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [Json] Avoid writing to PipeWriter if IAsyncEnumerable throws before first item #113503
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Allow specifying SDK search paths in global.json #113512
    area-Host
  • Remove redundant nullable annotation #113550
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Fix AcquireCredentialHandle parameter lifetime #113540
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #113448
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
